item.description:
Mike Butler is coming to NHREIA!

National speaker and real estate investing trainer, Mike Butler, will teach his 5M Wealth AutoPilot System.

He’ll show you his system of how he buys 2 deals per week in less than 5 hours while working his full time job as an undercover police detective . . .

· Learn about his unique proven system which allows investors to automate every aspect of your business… from wholesaling, rehabbers, retailing, seller financing, residential, commercial and tax free profit IRA deals.

· Discover 7 Tips to get more than 100% of your rents, keep your good tenants longer and reduce your tenant turnover saving time, money, and increasing your cash flow.

· Mike Butler will share eye-opening fatal mistakes made by new and veteran investors.

· His automated system captures every cent you spend to save tons on taxes.

· He has never gone to a bank to buy an investment property!

· He routinely gets 0% interest loans and gets them approved in 15 minutes or less


Come learn his secrets!

MONTHLY MEETING

WHEN: Wednesday, May 13th, 6:30 p.m.

WHERE: Best Western Executive Court, 13500 South Willow Street, Manchester

COST: Free for members; visitors pay only $20


ALL DAY INTENSIVE SEMINAR

WHEN: Saturday, May 16th, 8:00 a.m. – 4:00 p.m.

WHERE: The Yard Restaurant, 1211 South Mammoth Road, Manchester

COST: $49 for members; $99 for nonmembers; $129 day of event

Click here to register.
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association May Meetup
